Text: The Name of This Band Is Talking Heads is a double live album by Talking Heads, originally released in 1982.

Triplets:<The Name of This Band Is Talking Heads
1:
--------------------
Text: The Name of This Band Is Talking Heads:  The first disc featured the original quartet in recordings from 1977 and 1979, and the second disc the expanded ten-piece lineup that toured in 1980 and 1981.
Triplets:<This Band
2:
--------------------
Text: The Name of This Band Is Talking Heads:  The album contains live versions of songs that appear on their first four studio albums, "", "More Songs About Buildings and Food", "Fear of Music", and "Remain in Light."
